Name: FluentCMS
Description: FluentCMS default site template including some samples

Settings.MetaDescription: FluentCMS is an AI-powered, open-source Blazor CMS designed to streamline content management, offering flexibility and scalability for modern websites.

Roles.Name: Administrators
Roles.Description: Default administrators role with full access to the site

Roles.Name: Guests
Roles.Description: Default unauthenticated users role (not logged in users)

Roles.Name: All Users
Roles.Description: Default all users (authenticated or unauthenticated users)

Roles.Name: Contributors
Roles.Description: Contributor users to manage pages, plugins, etc.

Application, API and Data Integration

Content.Content:
About Me

I am a full-stack web developer with a passion for creating engaging, responsive, and scalable applications. With over four years in the field, I specialize in frameworks like React and Svelte and have expertise in Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap for designing beautiful, efficient interfaces.

ContentTypes.Title: Project
ContentTypes.Description: A content type for showcasing individual portfolio projects.

Fields.Name: start_date
Fields.Description: The date the project was started
Fields.Label: Start Date

Settings.Placeholder: Choose the date the project was started

Fields.Name: end_date
Fields.Description: The date the project was completed (optional)
Fields.Label: End Date

Settings.Placeholder: Choose the date the project was finished

Fields.Name: technologies
Fields.Description: List of technologies used in the project
Fields.Label: Technologies

Settings.Placeholder: Enter name of technologies used in the project

Fields.Name: project_url
Fields.Description: URL link to the live project or repository
Fields.Label: Project URL

Settings.Placeholder: Enter url or repisotory link of project

Fields.Name: image
Fields.Description: An image or screenshot of the project
Fields.Label: Image

Contents.description: A personal website showcasing my portfolio, blog, and contact information.
An e-commerce platform with a fully functional product listing, cart, and checkout system.
A mobile-friendly task management application with features like task assignment and deadlines.
A dashboard that aggregates social media analytics from platforms like Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram.
A blog platform with rich text editing, category management, and SEO optimizations.
A website for real estate agencies to list properties with interactive maps and contact features.

ContentTypes.Title: Skill
ContentTypes.Description: A content type for listing skills in the portfolio.

Fields.Name: proficiency
Fields.Description: Level of proficiency in this skill
Fields.Label: Proficiency
